featured.text: Future bank robbers will not need explosives to blow open bank safes—all they will need is someone who can break computer codes.

definition.zh_def: 搶劫者，指以暴力或威脅手段非法奪取他人財物的人。
definition.en_def: A person who steals from others using force or threats.
definition.example: The robber escaped with a bag full of money.
